heading: Multi-Agent Bot
description: Developed an AI-driven multi-agent system using LangGraph.js and Node.js to automate client support, order creation, and analytics reporting.

heading: Expense Tracker
description: Built a real-time full-stack expense tracker with Next.js, MongoDB, and Recharts. Implemented custom authentication and interactive income/expense charts.

heading: Fortune Heights
description: Built a production-ready MERN stack hotel booking website with authentication, optimized MongoDB queries, and efficient image handling.

heading: Diary Application
description: Developed a full-stack diary app with authentication (Login/Signup), secure entry management, and personalized user features.

heading: Add-User Webpage
description: Developed an Add User page with full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, allowing seamless user management.

heading: Weather Webpage
description: A user responsive API-based website which fetches weather information for a user-specified location and shows recent search history.

heading: Amazon-clone
description: A user-responsive website clone of amazon.com using HTML and CSS.
